data.title: Working At Insomniac Games: Company Overview and Culture
data.meta_description: Learn about working at Insomniac Games from employee reviews and detailed data on culture, salaries, demographics, management, financial, and more.
data.text:
Insomniac Games overview

Industry

Video Games

Revenue

Headquarters

Employees

401

Founded In

Website

Organization Type

Private

CEO

Insomniac Games is an independent video games developer that created the Ratchet & Clank and Resistance franchises. It has two studios: One in Burbank, California and the other in the Raleigh-Durham area in North Carolina.Founded in 1994, Insomniac Games is based in Burbank, California.

Founded in 1994, Insomniac Games is an established company that loves to hire graduates from University of California - Davis, with 9.1% of its employees having attended University of California - Davis. Want to compare Insomniac Games to some other great places to work in Burbank, CA? We suggest taking a look at Zippia's list of Best Companies to Work For in Burbank, CA.The average employee at Insomniac Games makes $76,344 per year. Pay at Insomniac Games is significantly lower than some of its highest paying competitors, like Zynga, Daybreak Game, and Glu Mobile, which pay $110,645, $101,117, and $99,820, respectively.

Insomniac Games is a medium technology company with 401 employees and an annual revenue of $17.0M that is headquartered in Burbank, CA.
